EmailTemplate.description: Sent to participants upon completion of the Onboarding Experience
EmailTemplate.name: OLD 08. Onboarding Completion and Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations! You've completed Sales Onboarding
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You've reached a milestone on the Sales Learning Journey!
Congratulations on completing Sales Onboarding! You've reached an important milestone on your Learning Journey with WEX.
We hope you enjoyed the Sales Onboarding experience. It is our goal to ensure the WEX Global Sales Training Team delivers a world class Sales Onboarding program.
In order to continue to improve the program and enhance the Learning Journey for all our sales professionals, we are asking you to answer a brief survey based on your experience.
Find the Salesforce Onboarding Survey here: https://wex.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_1NYZThtAkauX0UZ Please complete this by next Friday.
Email Sales Training with any questions.
Thank You, WEX University Global Sales Training
